commands.name: portal-search
commands.title: Portal Search
commands.subtitle: Search Outdoorsy admin portal
commands.description: Search Outdoorsy admin portal and open result in browser

preferences.name: useArcSpace
preferences.title: Use Arc Space
preferences.description: Open links in specific Arc browser space

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
